body:
What is the reasoning for turning on the cxx wrappers always when openmpi has turned them off by default?  This should be off by default... and enabled via a variant?

From the openmpi/package.py:
        if spec.satisfies('@2.0:'):
            # for Open-MPI 2.0:, C++ bindings are disabled by default.
            config_args.extend(['--enable-mpi-cxx'])





### Spack version

```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-206-e916a9424
```
title: openmpi and cxx
